title: Interpretation of the dream of traveling by car in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about traveling by car: If a person dreams of traveling by car, when he wakes up he actively tries to remember the most important and prominent details that accompanied this dream, then collects the facts and events that he saw, in order. To connect them to real life, it should be noted that most of the time the average person cannot find an accurate interpretation of his dream, which exposes him to searching for the opinions of scholars and translators, so through this article we will review and provide the most important evidence for interpreting a dream about traveling by car. Interpretation of a dream about a car in a dream according to Nabulsiqil Seeing a car in a dream means moving from one place to another and also indicates the visionary’s new life, so here we will learn about Imam Nabulsi’s opinion on this dream as follows: Imam Nabulsi mentioned that a car in a dream refers to the wife. And if the car is in good condition, It showed her healthy and comfortable relationship with her husband. The car also symbolizes the reshaping of the dreamer’s position. In addition, seeing this dream in a dream portends the future. It also expresses the great ambitions and high status that the dreamer is trying to achieve. While watching a car being sold in a dream, he It is a symbol of the presence of some crises, problems, and fears. In addition, there are losses that may befall the dreamer in reality. It is possible that the car in the dream symbolizes a high and great status for the dreamer. Also, if the dreamer sees that his car has broken down in the dream. This indicates the presence of some problems, obstacles, and problems. And difficulties. Interpretations of travel dreams. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing my husband’s car in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a car in a dream for a married woman. This dream is repeated and happens to be seen in the dreams of many people, whether male or female, but if a married woman sees a car in her dream, it is certain that her vision has meanings. Clear, as follows: The car in a married woman’s dream symbolizes the emergence of change and changing the situation to a better and better one, God willing. The same vision also indicates kindness and a lot of halal food, especially if the car is light in color. I also see a modern car in a woman’s dream Married. This symbolizes a good and righteous husband. In addition to that, it is a symbol of the extent of the close and good relationship and the existence of happiness and understanding between them in reality. While if a married woman sees that she crashed a car in her dream, this indicates a lack of control over the affairs of the house. The same vision also indicates the emergence And the emergence of some problems and disagreements between him and those close to him in reality. Interpretations of dreams about traveling. See also: Interpretation of a dream about driving a car with dead people in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a car in a divorced woman’s dream. There is no doubt that a divorced woman suffers a lot from some problems, because she is going through difficult and painful situations, so different visions appear in her dream. Where she saw the car in her dream has a clear interpretation, which is as follows: In general, the interpretation of this dream in a divorced woman’s dream depends on the condition of the car and its color. A white and red vehicle symbolizes their victory in reality over an apparent enemy.

title: Interpretation of a dream about fish in a dream 1444 Seeing fish

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about fish in a dream 1444 Seeing fish indicates many events that the dreamer is going through, and fish is one of the favorite seafood for many people, because fish has more than one cooking method and can be eaten fried or grilled, and some people long to eat a soup known as food soup Marine, fish has many benefits that bring many benefits to health. It supplies the body with phosphorus, calcium, and energy. Seeing it in a dream is evidence of many things because it is a source of livelihood and we wish you success. Fish in a dream indicates an abundance of good fortune and good luck. What is the interpretation of a dream about fish according to Al-Nabulsi: A person dreams of a large number of fish indicating money and wealth that will be acquired in the near future. As for a person’s dream of fishing in turbid and polluted waters, it indicates the stress and sadness that he suffers from. Eating salted fish indicates many crises that the dreamer is going through. See also: Interpretation of a dream about fish in a dream by Al-Asimima. What is the interpretation of a dream about fish for a single woman: A dream about fish means living for a single girl. Only it is a sign of good news. A dream about fish may indicate achieving the goals that this girl has been searching for for many years, and she thought it would be difficult to achieve and achieve in her time. Thus, fish in a girl’s dream indicates praiseworthy events, which indicates marriage to a man with good morals. Praiseworthy. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing fishing in a dream by Ibn SirinWhat is the interpretation of a dream about a fish for a married woman: ChersemkIn a dream, a married woman leads to a spacious living and many good things. If she sees that she is getting a fish from someone, this indicates good news soon It may indicate pregnancy. But a dream about live fish also indicates a calm and stable life, and the disappearance of worries and problems. Live fish indicate the disappearance of all marital problems. See also: The dream interpretation of seeing fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin by Al-Nabulsiima is the interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream of fish: This is what The dream of a fish in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates an easy birth and the nearness of the birth date. A dream of a fish in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates an easy and trouble-free birth. Seeing a pregnant woman cleaning fish indicates the birth of a boy with a beautiful face. What is the interpretation of a man’s dream of fish: The fish in a dream indicates A man has too many women in his life. The dream of catching small fish is one of the visions that is not popular with men, because it indicates fears and sorrows. This is how sad news of small raw fish appears. As for large raw fish, it indicates ample livelihood and abundance of money. And goods. Cleaning fish in a dream indicates a source of livelihood full of blessings and good luck. Seeing cooked fish full of thorns is one of the visions that warns the envious dreamer. Cleaning raw fish in a dream is eating raw fish in a dream. It is an unpleasant vision that indicates cruelty and stubbornness. It also indicates ingratitude. And worries and sorrow. It also indicates cleaning fish at the end of worry and worry. Seeing cleaning

title: Interpretation of a dream about the smell of a dead person in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the smell of a dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin: There is no doubt that seeing the smell of a dead person is one of the dreams that worries the dreamer, and it is worth mentioning that this may make him seek to know all the meanings and interpretations accurately, as some scholars have reported. From the interpretation, the clues and meanings about this vision vary and differ. Something that depends largely on the state of the vision. In general, the smell of the dead in a dream shows his fame and memory to people, and through the following article we will learn about the dream interpretation of the smell of the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about the smell of the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Dream interpretation of the smell of the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Sirin is one of the interpretations that many people are searching for, and its interpretation causes concern to many people, and it is worth noting that the interpretation of his dream about the smell of a dead person coming in a dream by Ibn Sirin is as follows: Ibn Sirin interprets that seeing the smell of a dead person in a dream is in his afterlife state, and perhaps hearing it. And the effect that he left after his death, and it is worth noting that this depends to a large extent on the smell, whether it is an unpleasant smell or a good smell. Ibn Sirin explained that the bad smell of the dead person in a dream indicates his many sins and disobedience, and that the bad smell of the dead person in a dream may indicate his bad condition in the future. After. As for seeing the good smell of the dead person in a dream, it indicates his good condition in the afterlife, and it can also indicate the good smell of the dead person in a dream because of his good influence on people. As for the smell of the dead person in the house in a dream, this indicates the continuity of his memory among individuals. His family and constant prayers for him. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a child in your arms for single and married people by Ibn Sirin and senior translators. Interpretation of a dream about the good smell of the deceased. After Ibn Sirin gave you the dream interpretation of the smell of the dead in a dream, seeing the good smell of the dead in a dream has many good connotations and meanings, which came as follows: As follows: If you see a good smell emanating from the dead in your dream, this means that he will leave him with a good reputation and good children. As for seeing in a dream a good smell coming from the dead in the house, it is a sign of his righteousness in sharing his inheritance with his family and children. The dream indicates a good smell coming from The dead person in the hospital refers to his remaining good deeds for people. See also: Interpretation of dreams I dreamed that my sister attacked her in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about the smell of musk from death in a dream. To complete the dream interpretation of the smell of the dead in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, seeing the smell of musk from death is considered a kind and good vision. Its interpretation was as follows: The dreamer’s testimony that the smell of musk emanates from a dead person in a dream is evidence of his good deeds and his righteousness among people. If the dreamer sees that he smells the smell of musk from a dead person, then this dream is a sign of his good influence and forgiveness for others after his death. As for the smell of musk From a dead father in a dream, it indicates his fairness in distributing his inheritance after his death. Also, the smell of musk emanating from a dead mother in a dream is a sign of her good outcome. Interpretation of a dream about smelling an unpleasant odor from a dead person in a dream: for

title: Interpretation of a woman having a mustache in a dream. Her mustache grew in a dream

preview.html: We explain to you the dream of a pregnant married woman in Ibn Sirin. For an unmarried girl, shaving off a mustache. For a woman who dreamed that I had a mustache. The meanings of the appearance of mustaches in a dream. Whoever dreams that he has a mustache and cuts it off, this means that he has made some promises and that he will fulfill those promises. If a woman dreams of a man with a long mustache, this indicates On a fleeting romantic relationship. If the mustache is short, the dream indicates the fear of losing love with the partner. Whoever dreams that a woman grows a mustache will give birth to a boy. If she is not pregnant and sterile, she will not give birth. If the one who is in slavery sees that he is flawless, then he is. Seeing a woman as having a mustache indicates She needs to act and take the first step. Ada, a woman who dreams that she is pregnant with a man’s mustache, indicates a danger to her reputation and she needs to control her behavior. A woman’s interpretation of having a beautiful mustache - YouTube

title: Interpretation of ghee in a dream for different occasions

preview.html: Interpretation of ghee in a dream for different occasions. Learn about the interpretation of ghee in a dream. Dreams are the events that we see in sleep, and some of them express your desires and dreams that occupy your mind all the time, and some of them do not express anything, and they are only talk about the soul from Satan, and from Among them is a true vision of God Almighty that tells the servant that good intentions are coming to him, but no one knows the interpretation of dreams except for the one who has Him, Glory be to Him. God has made a difference, and God Almighty alone knows the unseen. Interpretation of seeing ghee in a dream? If a person sees in his dream that he is eating many types of food, and feels the presence of ghee in the food, then it is so. This symbolizes many good things to come, and prosperity for that person.If you dream that you whip up a lot of mistletoe very quickly, while carrying a large amount. This indicates the abundance of money that you will have soon. Interpretation of seeing ghee in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing ghee in a dream generally expresses the coming goodness of the one who sees it and the abundant money he will obtain. It is also a symbol of the upcoming happiness and joy of the pioneer. Also, seeing ghee in food is a harbinger. Great opportunity to travel. To achieve his goals. Ghee also indicates the viewer’s culture, science and knowledge. Seeing yellow calf ghee denotes illness and sadness. Seeing white buffalo ghee denotes sustenance, future goodness and sometimes marriage and profit. Eating ghee with honey in a dream represents food, kindness and money that he will receive. Dreamer. Seeing eating ghee with bread in a dream symbolizes the healing of the sick, the joy coming after sadness, and the coming of wealth after poverty. If one sees liquid mistletoe in a dream, this indicates that he is facing some difficulties and problems related to one of the goals he seeks to achieve. If one sees liquid mistletoe in a dream, this indicates that he is facing some difficulties and problems related to one of the goals he seeks to achieve. Ghee in a dream represents the large amounts that will be given to the pioneer, but if one sees butter in his dream. This expresses the dreams and goals that the dreamer will achieve in the near future. Seeing yourself eating butter in a dream represents the success and superiority that the dreamer has achieved. If someone sees in a dream that he is selling butter. This indicates the lack of money he will receive. Seeing mistletoe struck, or beaten, indicates money coming to the pioneer through the distribution of the inheritance to his family. Interpretation of ghee in a dream for a single woman: If a girl sees in a dream that she is buying mistletoe. This symbolizes the approach of her engagement. Also, buying ghee to prepare sweets in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the approaching happy events and her marriage to a good man. Butter, or ghee in a girl’s dream, expresses her imminent luck. Buying mistletoe is a sign that the girl will marry a man It will make her very happy. Seeing an unmarried girl buying mistletoe has a pleasant smell and a disheveled appearance. It represents the halal money that this girl collects. If an unmarried girl sees that she wants to buy fat, she searches for it for a long time until she finds it. This indicates abundance and what God Almighty has bestowed upon her. Seeing herself eating ghee or butter in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates...

title: Interpretation of a dream about fire for a single woman

preview.html: If it is in the middle of time, then it shows bad things that you will see or diseases that you will experience during this time, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing fire in a dream for one girl: If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is looking at fire from afar, and that is the beginning of the new year for her. It appears. The dream is the food that she will find in her life after some fatigue and hardships during this period of time. And if an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is trying to extinguish the fire in the dream. It indicates that there is a big problem that she is suffering from at this time in her life, and God is the Most High, the Most High. And if an unmarried woman sees Married woman in a dream that there was a fire in her house, and she was very sad in the dream. Here it indicates the illness that this unmarried woman suffers from and she suffers from it for a long time. And if the unmarried dreamer gets engaged and sees many fires in the house, he will get married. It explains that there are problems A big one will appear with her fiancé at this time in her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about fire in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its meaningInterpretation of seeing fire in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees in a dream that the fire was very large inside her house. The interpretation shows that the married woman will face a big problem that will present itself At this time in her life. And the dreamer saw in a dream that she was trying to put out the fire in the dream and she was afraid. This means that there are major problems that this married woman will suffer from in her life. As for the married woman who sees in the dream that she sees many fires and she is very sad. It indicates To a major failure that she will face in her life and suffer from it. And if a married woman sees a big fire in a dream. It appears here that this married woman will face in her life the illness of one of her close relatives. This will make her very upset. Interpretation of seeing fire in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she was looking at A big fire in her house and she was happy about it. This indicates that there are major problems that will arise with her at this time, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. As for the divorced woman who sees that she succeeds in getting rid of the fire in the dream, this is an indication of his freedom from all the problems that he was suffering from and facing. During this period, such as the divorced woman who believes that her ex-husband was helping her get rid of the fire. It shows a problem that she will get into and she will see her ex-husband getting her out of it. And the divorced woman who sees in a dream that she is looking for someone to help her extinguish the fire in the dream. Her extreme loneliness is interpreted as being You are suffering from it at this time, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about fire (fire) in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing fire in a dream for a man and its meaningIf someone sees in a dream that he sees many fires around him, then he feels sorry. It indicates the presence of major problems This person will face it in his field of work or in his private life. The dreamer who sees in a dream that he is trying to extinguish the fire and succeeds in this matter. This means getting rid of some of the problems that plagued him in this period of his life. And seeing the dreamer in a dream looking at the fire and being sad. This is

And if an unmarried woman sees Married woman in a dream that there was a fire in her house, and she was very sad in the dream. Here it indicates the illness that this unmarried woman suffers from and she suffers from it for a long time. And if the unmarried dreamer gets engaged and sees many fires in the house, he will get married. It explains that there are problems A big one will appear with her fiancé at this time in her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about fire in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its meaningInterpretation of seeing fire in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees in a dream that the fire was very large inside her house. The interpretation shows that the married woman will face a big problem that will present itself At this time in her life. And the dreamer saw in a dream that she was trying to put out the fire in the dream and she was afraid. This means that there are major problems that this married woman will suffer from in her life. As for the married woman who sees in the dream that she sees many fires and she is very sad. It indicates To a major failure that she will face in her life and suffer from it. And if a married woman sees a big fire in a dream. It appears here that this married woman will face in her life the illness of one of her close relatives. This will make her very upset. Interpretation of seeing fire in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she was looking at A big fire in her house and she was happy about it. This indicates that there are major problems that will arise with her at this time, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. As for the divorced woman who sees that she succeeds in getting rid of the fire in the dream, this is an indication of his freedom from all the problems that he was suffering from and facing. During this period, such as the divorced woman who believes that her ex-husband was helping her get rid of the fire. It shows a problem that she will get into and she will see her ex-husband getting her out of it. And the divorced woman who sees in a dream that she is looking for someone to help her extinguish the fire in the dream. Her extreme loneliness is interpreted as being You are suffering from it at this time, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It indicates the presence of major problems This person will face it in his field of work or in his private life. The dreamer who sees in a dream that he is trying to extinguish the fire and succeeds in this matter. This means getting rid of some of the problems that plagued him in this period of his life. title: Interpretation of praying for the Prophet in a dream for different occasions

preview.html: Here is the interpretation of praying to the Prophet in a dream in detail. Dreams are known as a series of fantasies about a group of interconnected situations or actions in a dream, which may not be completely logical in reality, but they appear very logical during the dream that a person sees during his sleep at night, even though the dream is Long hours, but the dream only lasts for a few minutes. Some experts have attributed a person seeing dreams during his sleep to the fact that they may be internal wishes or desires that he cannot achieve in reality, so he fulfills them in his dreams, or they may express things and ideas that occupy one person. He thinks about himself all day long and is reflected at night in his subconscious mind and appears in his dreams. Whatever the case may be, it is certain that these dreams carry among their manifestations many symbols and signs that carry specific meanings in a person’s life, so a person searches for their interpretations carefully so that he knows what the days may bring. For him. Well, here is the interpretation of the dream of praying for the Prophet upon Ibn Sirin from the encyclopedia website. The interpretation of praying for the Prophet in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of praying for the Prophet Ibn Sirin. Praying for the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, the best of creation and the last of the messengers who spread the principles of the Orthodox Islamic religion, are praiseworthy topics with great reward. Which the Messenger named him. By persevering in his good reward in this world and the hereafter. The Islamic translator Ibn Sirin said about seeing prayers upon the Prophet - may God bless him and grant him peace - in a dream that it is one of the good visions that a person sees in a dream because it carries meanings of goodness, livelihood and prosperity. For whomever dreams about it. If a sick person sees in a dream that he is praying for the Prophet, this is evidence of his near recovery from his illness, God willing, and an indication of the afflicted and anxious person praying for the Prophet during his sleep. Bringing relief closer, alleviating his worries, and removing all the obstacles he suffers from. Also, praying for the Prophet in a dream indicates the victory of truth and the suppression of falsehood, and this is good news that he will soon visit the Sacred House of God and be honored to see the Holy Kaaba and visit the Prophet’s Mosque, may God bless him and grant him peace. Whoever suffers from Worries and the accumulation of debts on himself in this world, and he saw in his dream that he was praying to the best of creation, Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, and God gave him abundant wealth to pay for it. His religion extends to his livelihood and the livelihood of his family, and there he will come home to his wealth, blessing and great prosperity. Interpretation of praying for the Prophet in a dream for a man: If one sees in a dream that he is sitting inside a large mosque and repeating prayers for the Prophet over and over again, this is evidence that God Almighty will give him a lot of blessings. Goodness is where it does not count, and he will get rid of it. All the worries and problems of the world, and God Almighty suffices for him to think about the affairs of the world and protect his money and his family. Also, if a man sees himself sitting in a public place, and recites the morning supplications, then he recites them to the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, a sign that he will be blessed with mercy and many blessings in his life. The world. Interpretation of praying upon the Prophet in a dream for an unmarried woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is sitting in a place

title: Interpretation of a dream about smallpox in a dream and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about smallpox in a dream: There are many skin diseases that can affect humans, and these diseases differ in their severity and symptoms, and one of the most famous infectious skin diseases is smallpox. This disease comes with many symptoms, the most famous of which are severe itching and high temperatures. Antiviral medications are used to treat the disease in addition to allergy medications to control the symptoms. A person can see that he is infected with this disease in a dream, so we will present it to you during the article. Interpretation of a dream about smallpox in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about pimples on the body for a single woman. Pimples in a single woman’s dream indicate her desire to start a family and communicate with someone she loves, as well as an indication that the dreamer desires Skipping the stage of study, and interpreting a dream about pimples on her body. Singular indicates the following: An unmarried woman who sees pimples on her face in a dream is a promising dream for her. Seeing birth control pills for unmarried women in a dream means that they will excel in studies and graduate from the university with a high degree. Also, seeing pimples on their bodies indicates Unmarried women indicate that they will soon be infected with Iraq. If a single woman sees red pills spread all over her body in her dream, this means her intense love for someone she would like to contact soon. If an unmarried woman sees birth control pills in her hand and face in a dream, this means that Her family life is stable, and this means that her psychological state is improving. An unmarried woman who sees white pimples on her body means that her marriage is near and will be with someone she loves and desires. Whereas if an unmarried woman sees brown pimples in her dream, this means that she is jealous of those close to her. Perhaps brown pimples in a dream indicate that there is someone who magically makes the dreamer miserable and prevents her from marrying. See also: Interpretation of a dream about reading the Qur’an in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing pimples on the body for a young, unmarried or single man. If he sees in his dream that his body is covered with pimples, this means his goodness in life. Life, and means that his future is full of gifts and blessings, as indicated by seeing pimples on the body. . Unmarried: If a young man dreams of having a large red pill in his hand, this indicates that he loves the girl he met at university or at school and he will marry her soon. Scattering pills on the body in a bachelor’s dream means that he will find a good job opportunity for him, or if he If he works, it means that he will get a promotion at work. The vision indicates that the dreamer is blessed with an abundance of money. Also, brown grains in a man’s dream means that he is envied. Also, seeing brown grains in a young man’s dream means a lot of people who hate him, whether at work or in his family. He should be careful of it. It means smallpox in the

title: Different interpretations of seeing nails in a dream

preview.html: Nails in a dream: Seeing nails is one of the dreams in which scientists have provided many clues that vary depending on the dreamer’s vision and circumstances, and the nail is one of the important tools that often helps us repair and install things. The dream means good for a person unless something bad happens to him. Nails in a dream The interpretation of a dream about nails in a dream shows many clues, namely: Some scholars believe that nails are solid things and are often useful, so seeing nails indicates the dreamer’s strength, courage, and continuous efforts to achieve justice. Finding nails while cleaning the house in a dream is a good sign of the abundance of goodness and many blessings that await the dreamer. If the dreamer sees a lot of nails in his dream and is going through some worries in his life, this indicates the relief of worries, the end of problems, and the beginning of a new phase with happiness and nourishment. Wide. Nails in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin offers us various interpretations that indicate the interpretation of seeing nails in a dream, such as: If you see a nail in a dream, it means that good things are coming, which may be a marriage, a promotion at work, or new investments. Nails in a dream indicate that the dreamer is a positive person who tries to spread optimism among people and always helps them. When an unmarried woman sees nails while cleaning the floor and throws them in the trash in a dream, this means that someone is proposing to her, but she does not want him. Go to Google and type Interpretation of dreams on the Internet and you will find all the interpretations of Ibn Sirin. Nails in a dream for a single woman. In the event that a single woman sees nails in a dream, it is interpreted as a social person who loves to make friends. When a girl sees a rusty nail in a dream, this symbolizes that she has bad friends who do not wish It has goodness. If an unmarried woman eats nails in a dream, this means that she is shrewd and hurts people with bad words. Seeing an unmarried woman wiping her nails in a dream indicates her marriage to a generous person who tries to please her in different ways. If you see nails being placed in her body and she gets hurt during the dream, It means that a group of people around her are trying to harm her. Nails in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees a nail in her dream, this means that there are many people who she cares about and takes care of in reality. When she drives a nail into the wall during a dream, this means that she will take Correct decisions for her family. If a woman sees a large, straight nail in her dream, it is fortunate that her husband is good and upright and is trying to achieve a comfortable standard of living for her. When a woman sees a crooked and unhealthy nail in her dream, this means that there are many differences between her and her husband as a result of his bad behavior. If a married woman swallows many nails in her dream, this indicates the many problems and difficulties she faces in life, her great suffering, and her feeling of great sadness. Nails in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees nails in a dream

title: A sermon in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Preaching in a dream Engagement or engagement is the connection between a man and a woman in order to meet and implement within the legal limits that both parties are committed to, and if there is acceptance and each of them is guaranteed to the other here, then this relationship is the culmination of marriage and seeing engagement in a dream has many connotations received by the scholars of interpretation, which differ between the dreamer being a man or a woman or the symbol being the dissolution of the engagement or engagement of a married or famous person or other, and we will explain all this and more in the following lines of the article. Engagement in a dream In the interpretation of the dream of engagement, jurists mentioned several connotations, the most important of which are the following: If a person sees that he is preparing for engagement in a dream, and it belongs to a person dear to his heart, then this is a sign that the owner of the engagement has heard some good news. The engagement of a brother or sister in a dream symbolizes that this connection has already taken place on earth. If a person dreams that he is going to an engagement party and feels a lot of happiness, then this is a sign that his life will soon turn for the better and he will witness many enjoyable events in the next period of his life. When a man dreams that he is marrying a beautiful girl, this is a sign that he will be promoted in His work, such as assuming an important position and bearing many responsibilities. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google for the secrets of dream interpretation, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading scholars of interpretation. Engagement in a dream by Ibn Sirin The great Imam Ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him - explained that seeing engagement in a dream has many interpretations, the most important of which are the following: If a man dreams that he is engaged to a rich girl, this is a sign that all the problems he faces in his life will end and he will be able to pay off all the debts that have accumulated on him. And if a person sees that he is forced to commit in a dream, this is a sign that this will also happen in reality. If a man sees in his sleep that he is engaged to a girl with bad features, this leads him to a series of crises in this period of his life. Canceling the engagement in the dream of an unmarried girl means that some quarrels and disagreements will arise between her and the young man she belongs to. And whoever sees in his dream that he is preparing for engagement, the dream indicates that he can achieve his goals and fulfill his desires in the near future. Engagement in a dream for a single woman Interpretation of a dream of engagement with an unmarried woman means that the problems she is going through in This period of her life will soon end and will be replaced by psychological comfort and happiness. Imam Al-Sadiq mentioned that if the girl does not want to get engaged during this period and dreams of engagement, this is an indication of many changes in her life. Seeing the engagement of an unmarried person symbolizes her excellence in her studies and obtaining the highest grades this year. The dream may be a sign that she is thinking a lot about the relationship and establishing an emotional connection. The scholar Ibn Sirin says that the engagement of an attractive young man in a dream for an unmarried woman is taken for her marriage in waking life to a man with whom she lives happily and lovingly. Engagement in a dream for a married woman Seeing engagement in a dream for a married woman
